ARABIC: مَّلْعُونِينَ أَيْنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓا۟ أُخِذُوا۟ وَقُتِّلُوا۟ تَقْتِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They are an accursed people. Wherever they are found they should be seized and mercilessly put to death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Accursed, they would be seized wherever found, and slain mercilessly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall be cursed from all around and they shall be ruthlessly killed wherever they are seized.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be condemned wherever they are and will be sized and done away with for good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Accursed – to be caught wherever found and to be slain thoroughly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Accursed, they shall be seized wherever found, and killed with a (terrible) slaughter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Cursed: wherever they are found they shall be seized and murdered, a (horrible) murdering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: cursed they shalt be, and wheresoever they are come upon they shall be seized and slaughtered all --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Accursed, they will be seized wherever found and slain with a (fierce) slaughter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Accursed, wherever they are found, they will be seized and killed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Accursed; wherever found they shall be laid hold of and slain with a relentless slaughter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Accursed, they will be seized wherever they are confronted and slain violently:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They shall have a curse on them: whenever they are found, they shall be seized and slain (without mercy).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Accursed, wherever found, they shall be seized and killed with a (terrible) slaughter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: cursed wherever they are found, they will be seized and put to death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They are cursed; wherever they are found, they should be captured and killed outright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Accursed wherever they are found, [being] seized and massacred completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:61] Accursed, banished from mercy, [shall they be], wherever they are found they shall be seized and slain violently, that is to say, that is the ruling concerning them — meant as a command [for the Prophet].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Accursed) they will be killed, (they will be seized wherever found and slain with a (fierce) slaughter.
